wordpressPage.title: Duck, Duck, Goose
wordpressPage.content:
A classic game many young people will remember from being children.

  • Sit everyone in a circle and have one person walk around the circle tapping people’s heads (gently!). As they do they say either ‘duck’ or ‘goose’. If they say ‘duck’ then nothing happens, if they say ‘goose’ then the person sat down must chase them around the circle in an effort to get back to their space in the circle before the person who tapped them can.
  • If the ‘goose’ makes it back to their space first then the original person goes again, if the original person steals their space then the ‘goose’ now taps people.
  • End this game after a while (there is no winner or loser!)
